# Da new wiki. For testing the new install.

server {
    server_name new.notifiarr.wiki;
    listen      443 ssl http2;
    access_log  /config/log/nginx/notifiarr.wiki_access.log local;
    include     /config/nginx/ssl.conf;
    include     /config/nginx/proxy.conf;
    set $notifiarr http://10.1.0.226:3000;
    location    / {
        proxy_pass $notifiarr$request_uri;
    }
}
